upgraded: OpenAI package updated. The model gpt-3.5-turbo is available!
updated: Context saving of conversations is working better by removing old messages. That allows to have an infinite conversation without the context resetting.
fixed: Response max token decreased from 4000 to 1000.
notes: Updating to 3.5 allows to decrease the cost from $0.020/1k tokens to $0.002/1k tokens. The language model is working in the same way.
